jailbreakpipe.llms package

Submodules

jailbreakpipe.llms.base module

class jailbreakpipe.llms.base.BaseLLM(config: BaseLLMConfig)[source]

Bases: ABC

Abstract base class for LLM.

Parameters:

config – Configuration object for LLM. LLM的配置对象

property avg_tokens

Get the average number of tokens per request.

Returns:

Average number of tokens. 返回每次请求的词汇平均值

batch_generate(batch_messages: List[List[Dict[str, str]]], config: LLMGenerateConfig) → List[List[Dict[str, str]] | Tuple[List[Dict[str, str]], List[float]]][source]

Generate responses for a batch of messages concurrently.

Parameters:

  • batch_messages – List of batches of messages. 消息的批量列表

  • config – Configuration for generation. 生成配置

Returns:

List of generated responses. 返回生成的应答列表

abstract evaluate_log_likelihood(messages: List[Dict[str, str]], config: LLMGenerateConfig) → List[float][source]

Abstract method for evaluating log likelihood of messages.

Parameters:

  • messages – List of messages to evaluate. 需要评估的消息列表

  • config – Configuration for generation. 生成配置

Returns:

List of log likelihoods. 返回的百分比列表

abstract generate(messages: List[Dict[str, str]], config: LLMGenerateConfig) → List[Dict[str, str]] | Tuple[List[Dict[str, str]], List[float]][source]

Abstract method for generating response from LLM.

Parameters:

  • messages – List of messages for input. 输入的消息列表

  • config – Configuration for generation. 生成配置

Returns:

Generated response or responses with log probabilities. 返回生成的应答或启用百分比的应答

reset()[source]

Reset the token counts and the number of requests.

重置词汇计数和请求次数

property total_tokens

Get the total number of tokens used.

Returns:

Total number of tokens. 返回的词汇总数

update(prompt_tokens: int, completion_tokens: int, num_requires: int)[source]

Update the token counts and number of requests.

Parameters:

  • prompt_tokens – Number of tokens in prompt. 提示中的词汇数

  • completion_tokens – Number of tokens in completion. 完成中的词汇数

  • num_requires – Number of requests made. 请求次数

class jailbreakpipe.llms.base.BaseLLMConfig(llm_type: str | None = None, model_name: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: ABC

Base configuration for LLM.

Parameters:

  • llm_type – Type of the LLM. LLM的类型

  • model_name – Name of the model. 模型的名称

llm_type: str = None
model_name: str = None
class jailbreakpipe.llms.base.LLMGenerateConfig(max_n_tokens: int | None = None, temperature: float | None = None, logprobs: bool = False, seed: int | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Configuration for LLM generation.

Parameters:

  • max_n_tokens – Maximum number of tokens to generate. 最大生成的词汇数量

  • temperature – Temperature for sampling randomness. 用于样本随机的温度参数

  • logprobs – Whether to return log probabilities. 是否返回logprobs

  • seed – Seed for reproducibility. 用于可重复的种子

logprobs: bool = False
max_n_tokens: int = None
seed: int = None
temperature: float = None

class jailbreakpipe.llms.hf.HuggingFaceLLM(config: HuggingFaceLLMConfig)[source]

Bases: BaseLLM

Hugging Face Language Model Implementation.

Parameters:

config – Configuration for Hugging Face LLM. 用于模型配置

batch_generate(batch_messages: List[List[Dict[str, str]]], config: LLMGenerateConfig) → List[List[Dict[str, str]]][source]

Generate responses for a batch of messages in a single call.

Parameters:

  • batch_messages – List of batches of messages. 批量生成的消息列表

  • config – Configuration for LLM generation. 生成配置

Returns:

List of generated responses for each batch. 返回每个批量的生成应答列表

evaluate_log_likelihood(messages: List[Dict[str, str]], config: LLMGenerateConfig) → List[float][source]

Evaluate the log likelihood of the given messages.

Parameters:

  • messages – List of messages for evaluation. 需要评估的消息列表

  • config – Configuration for LLM generation. 生成配置

Returns:

List of log likelihood values. 返回的log likelihood值列表

generate(messages: List[Dict[str, str]], config: LLMGenerateConfig) → List[Dict[str, str]] | Tuple[List[Dict[str, str]], List[float]][source]

Generate a response for a given input using Hugging Face model.

Parameters:

  • messages – List of input messages. 输入的消息列表

  • config – Configuration for LLM generation. 生成配置

Returns:

Generated response or response with logprobs. 返回生成的应答或启用logprobs的应答

class jailbreakpipe.llms.hf.HuggingFaceLLMConfig(llm_type: str = 'HuggingFaceLLM', model_name: [<class 'str'>, typing.Any] = None, device_map: str = 'auto')[source]

Bases: BaseLLMConfig

Hugging Face LLM Configuration.

Parameters:

  • llm_type – Type of LLM, default is “HuggingFaceLLM”. LLM的类型，默认值为 “HuggingFaceLLM”

  • model_name – Name of the model or model instance. 模型的名称或模型实例

  • device_map – Device mapping for model deployment. 用于模型部署的设备对应表

device_map: str = 'auto'
llm_type: str = 'HuggingFaceLLM'
model_name: [<class 'str'>, typing.Any] = None

jailbreakpipe.llms.llm_registry module

jailbreakpipe.llms.llm_registry.create_llm(config: BaseLLMConfig | Dict[str, Any]) → BaseLLM[source]

Create an LLM instance based on the provided configuration.

Parameters:

config – Configuration for LLM, can be a BaseLLMConfig or a dictionary. 用于LLM的配置，可以是BaseLLMConfig或字典形式

Returns:

An instance of the LLM defined by the configuration. 返回配置所定义的LLM实例

jailbreakpipe.llms.llm_registry.register_llm(llm: type[T]) → type[T][source]

Register a subclass of BaseLLM with the LLMS registry.

Parameters:

llm – Subclass of BaseLLM to register. 要注册的BaseLLM的子类

Returns:

The registered LLM subclass. 返回注册的LLM子类

jailbreakpipe.llms.oai module

class jailbreakpipe.llms.oai.OpenAiChatLLM(config: OpenAiLLMConfig)[source]

Bases: BaseLLM

OpenAI Chat LLM Implementation.

Parameters:

config – Configuration for OpenAI Chat LLM. 用于OpenAI小谱LLM的配置

evaluate_log_likelihood(messages: List[Dict[str, str]], config: LLMGenerateConfig) → List[float][source]

Evaluate the log likelihood of the given messages.

Parameters:

  • messages – List of messages for evaluation. 需要评估的消息列表

  • config – Configuration for LLM generation. 生成配置

Raises:

NotImplementedError – OpenAI Chat does not support log likelihood evaluation. 这个LLM属性不支持log likelihood评估

generate(messages: List[Dict[str, str]], config: LLMGenerateConfig) → List[Dict[str, str]] | Tuple[List[Dict[str, str]], List[float]][source]

Generate a response for a given input using OpenAI Chat API.

Parameters:

  • messages – List of input messages. 输入的消息列表

  • config – Configuration for LLM generation. 生成配置

Returns:

Generated response or response with logprobs. 返回生成的应答或启用logprobs的应答

class jailbreakpipe.llms.oai.OpenAiChatLLMConfig(llm_type: str = 'OpenAiChatLLM', model_name: str | None = None, base_url: str | None = None, api_key: str = 'KEY HERE')[source]

Bases: BaseLLMConfig

OpenAI Chat LLM Configuration.

Parameters:

  • llm_type – Type of LLM, default is “OpenAiChatLLM”. LLM的类型，默认值为 “OpenAiChatLLM”

  • model_name – Name of the model. 模型的名称

  • base_url – Base URL for the OpenAI API. OpenAI API的基础URL

  • api_key – API key for accessing OpenAI. 访问OpenAI的API密钥

api_key: str = 'KEY HERE'
base_url: str = None
llm_type: str = 'OpenAiChatLLM'
model_name: str = None

class jailbreakpipe.llms.LLMGenerateConfig(max_n_tokens: int | None = None, temperature: float | None = None, logprobs: bool = False, seed: int | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Configuration for LLM generation.

  • temperature – Temperature for sampling randomness. 用于样本随机的温度参数

  • logprobs – Whether to return log probabilities. 是否返回logprobs

  • seed – Seed for reproducibility. 用于可重复的种子
